name: Secret of Century III: Dreams Lost
name_original: Secret of Century III: Dreams Lost
description:
I am connecting ideas from urban development and spatial theory with the aesthetics & motifs of Gothic Horror, and through the practice of 3D game development, build an interactive story about how the Century III Mall haunts the community it was built in.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left Click to Examine
  • Right Click to Exit Out of Examine View
  • E to Pick Up Object
  • F to Turn on Flashlight (need to find and collect flashlight first)
  • Q to reload Flashlight batteries (need to find and collect flashlight batteries first)
  • Space to Jump
  • Shift to Run
